sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./About.css"; const About = () => { return ( <>

Hi, I'm

Deepa Devangmath

Introduction

Hi, I am a licensed architect with a passion for creating meaningful architectural solutions. I believe in harmony between context, built form, and users, and my research delves into how space impacts human behavior and mental well-being.

I have actively collaborated on various live projects and take great interest in conducting case studies of thoughtfully designed spaces, focusing on their construction methods, material choices, and zoning strategies.

More about me

Where am I from?

I am originally from India and am currently based in Chicago, USA, pursuing my Master of Science in Architecture at Illinois Institute of Technology.

What is my Dream Job?

My dream job is to establish my own architecture firm, where I can lead projects from concept design to implementation, blending creativity and functionality in every project.

What inspires me?

I am inspired by spaces that evoke emotion, connect people, and tell stories. Design to me is not just about aesthetics but also about functionality and human connection.

You can find out a bit more about me in these places:

  • Twitter
  • GitHub
  • LinkedIn
); }; export default About;
